item.title: vienna-to-visit
item.description: A little Vis of all sights so visit in vienna. The data comes from publicly available data, found on: https://data.wien.gv.at. library(magrittr) read.csv("https://data.wien.gv.at/daten/geo?service=WFS&request=GetFeature&version=1.1.0&typeName=ogdwien:SEHENSWUERDIGOGD&srsName=EPSG:4326&outputFormat=csv") %>% dplyr::mutate(COORDS = stringr::str_remove(SHAPE, "POINT "), COORDS = stringr::str_remove(COORDS, "\\("), COORDS = stringr::str_remove(COORDS, "\\)"), X = (stringr::str_split(COORDS, " ") %>% purrr::transpose())[[1]] %>% unlist() %>% as.numeric(), Y = (stringr::str_split(COORDS, " ") %>% purrr::transpose())[[2]] %>% unlist() %>% as.numeric()) %>% dplyr::select(NAME, ADRESSE, WEITERE_INF, THUMBNAIL, X, Y) %>% leaflet::leaflet() %>% leaflet::addTiles() %>% leaflet::addMarkers(~X,~Y, label = ~paste0(NAME,"<br/>", ADRESSE), popup = ~paste0(NAME,"<br/>", ADRESSE, "<br/>", WEITERE_INF), icon = ~leaflet::icons(iconUrl = THUMBNAIL)) {"
